summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite for the fapolicy analyzer application, covering UI widgets, GTK components, backend utilities, policy rule handling, trust database management, profiling, session management, and commandâ€‘line entry points, using mocks and fixtures to validate functionality and error handling.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the fapolicy analyzer by detecting regressions and validating that all user interface elements, policy processing logic, and supporting utilities behave as expected under various conditions.
